Class MenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity.MenuItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WriteToTxt

    public class MenuItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements WriteToTxt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MenuItem(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String type, double price, java.lang.String description)
      Create a new menu item with name, type, price and description

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attach(PromotionalPackage promotionalPackage)
      Attach a promotional package to this menu item The attached promotional package will receive the updates from this menu item
      void detach(PromotionalPackage promotionalPackage)
      Detach a promotional package from this menu item The detached promotional package will no longer receive updates from this menu item
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Get the description of the menu item
      java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name of the menu item
      double getPrice()
      Get the price of the menu item

      Get the type of the menu item
      void notifyPromotionalPackage()
      Notify all the promotional package containing this menu item To be used when the menu item is deleted
      void notifyPromotionalPackage(MenuItem menuItem)
      Notify all the promotional package containing this menu item To be used when the menu item is replace with another menu item
      void print(boolean detail)
      Print the detail of this menu item
      static void setMenu(Menu menu)
      Set the menu containing this menu item
      java.lang.String toString()
      Format of the string: id|name|type|price|description

      • print

        public void print(boolean detail)
        Print the detail of this menu item
        Parameters:
        detail - whether to print all the detail of this menu item detail == true: print name, price, type, description detail == false: print only name

        public void notifyPromotionalPackage(MenuItem menuItem)

      • attach

        public void attach(PromotionalPackage promotionalPackage)
        Attach a promotional package to this menu item The attached promotional package will receive the updates from this menu item
        Parameters:
        promotionalPackage - the reference to the promotional package to be attached

      • detach

        public void detach(PromotionalPackage promotionalPackage)
        Detach a promotional package from this menu item The detached promotional package will no longer receive updates from this menu item
        Parameters:
        promotionalPackage - the reference to the promotional package to be detached
